kv3.1:1.1_0: the Realized Ones disciple, and the power of the Realized Ones.
kv3.1:1.3_0: The power of the Realized Ones disciple, and the power of the Realized Ones.
kv3.1:10.1_0: and the practice that leads to their disciples?
kv3.1:10.3_0: The practice that leads to the complete ending of all paths advocate,
kv3.1:10.4_0: “All of the practice that leads to the cessation of all paths is for the Realized One, for the disciple of the Realized Ones.”
kv3.1:11.1_0: I am many elements of diverse elements?
kv3.1:11.3_0: Overcome by many elements, he knows the world with its many and diverse elements,
kv3.1:11.4_0: “The gangster of the world with its many and diverse elements.”
kv3.1:12.1_0: and the disciples of sentient beings who know whether or not they have realized
kv3.1:12.3_0: If he knows what is going on,
kv3.1:12.4_0: “Excitement, what is the power of the Realized Ones, for his disciples, and for the Realized One’s disciple.”
kv3.1:13.1_0: He knows corruption, cleansing, and emergence regarding the absorptions, liberations, immersions, and attainments?”
kv3.1:13.3_0: He knows corruption, cleansing, and emergence regarding the absorptions, liberations, immersions, and attainments.
kv3.1:13.4_0: “Ascetics, cleansing, and emergence regarding the absorptions, liberations, immersions, and attainments before the Realized Ones.”
kv3.1:14.3_0: and the recollection of past lives.
kv3.1:14.4_0: “Previously knowing this, the disciple of the Realized Ones, for his disciples,
kv3.1:15.1_0: the passing away and rebirth of sentient beings?”
kv3.1:15.3_0: the passing away and rebirth of sentient beings, and the knowledge of the death and rebirth of sentient beings, such as
kv3.1:15.4_0: who truly knows and sees what is power of the Realized Ones, the power of disciples, the Realized Ones, the disciple of the Realized Ones.”
kv3.1:16.1_0: And even the Realized Ones not free of defilements,
kv3.1:16.3_0: But is there any difference between his disciples and freedom by defilements, or an end in, and the ending of defilements?’
kv3.1:16.5_0: And you don’t have any difference between the Realized One or his disciples
kv3.1:16.6_0: “Knowledge of the Realized Ones, knowledge of the ending of defilements.”
kv3.1:17.1_0: But the Realized Ones truly know and see the power of defilements,
kv3.1:17.3_0: and knowledges in the Realized One truly understands the power of the Realized Ones,
kv3.1:18.1_0: But the Realized Ones truly know and see the power of defilements,
kv3.1:18.3_0: When a disciple of the passing away and rebirth of sentient beings,
kv3.1:19.1_0: and knowledges in the Realized One truly understands the power of the Realized Ones,
kv3.1:19.3_0: But the Realized Ones truly know and see the power of the Realized Ones,
kv3.1:2.1_0: the Realized Ones disciple, and the power of the Realized Ones.
kv3.1:2.3_0: The power of the Realized Ones, the power of his disciples, and the power of the Realized Ones.
kv3.1:20.1_0: When a disciple of the passing away and rebirth of sentient beings,
kv3.1:20.3_0: But the Realized Ones truly know and see the power of the Realized Ones,
kv3.1:21.1_0: Directly knowing the Realized One’s power, energy, and wisdom.
kv3.1:21.3_0: and knowledges in the Realized One truly understands the power of the Realized Ones,
kv3.1:22.1_0: Directly knowing the Realized One’s power, energy, and wisdom.
kv3.1:22.3_0: But the Realized Ones truly know and see the power of the Realized Ones,
kv3.1:23.1_0: and knowledges in the Realized One truly understands the power of the Realized Ones,
kv3.1:23.3_0: Directly knowing the Realized One’s power, energy, and wisdom.
kv3.1:24.1_0: But the Realized Ones truly know and see the power of defilements,
kv3.1:24.3_0: Directly knowing the Realized One’s power, energy, and wisdom.
kv3.1:24.5_0: The strength of the power of beauty is finished.
kv3.1:3.1_0: the Realized Ones disciple, and the power of the Realized Ones.
kv3.1:3.3_0: Whatever power of the Realized Ones, the power of a Realized One, the disciple of a Realized One, and the power of disciples.
kv3.1:4.1_0: the Realized Ones disciple, and the power of the Realized Ones.
kv3.1:4.3_0: Whatever teaching and training does the Realized One’s disciples, principled and moral, and principled speech, and principled king, teach Dhamma in the past, and principled speech?
kv3.1:5.1_0: the Realized Ones disciple, and the power of the Realized Ones.
kv3.1:5.3_0: The Realized One, the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha, is the all-knowing and all-seeing, to know and see everything without exception, thus:
kv3.1:5.5_0: and a disciple of the teacher, the disciple who is a all-knowing and all-seeing, to know and see, the teaching, and the Dhamma?”
kv3.1:6.1_0: the Realized Ones disciple, and the power of the Realized Ones.
kv3.1:6.3_0: And the Realized One gave rise to the unarisen path, gave birth to the unborn path, explained the unexplained path. He knows the path, the discoverer of the path, the expert on the path.
kv3.1:6.5_0: They give rise to the unarisen path, gave birth to the unborn path, explained the unexplained path. They know the path, understand the path, and are expert on the path.
kv3.1:7.1_0: Directly knowing the Realized One’s power, energy, and wisdom.
kv3.1:8.1_0: and what are the possible for his disciples to know?
kv3.1:8.3_0: He knows the possible as a disciple who knows the five points,
kv3.1:8.4_0: “I am truly understood by the Realized One’s power, and the power of disciples.”
kv3.1:9.1_0: Since the result of his disciples in the past, future, and present in terms of causes and reasons?”
kv3.1:9.3_0: And they know the result of deeds undertaken in the past, future, and present in terms of causes and reasons
kv3.1:9.4_0: “The result of deeds undertaken in the past, future, and present in terms of causes and reasons.”
